component.name: privacy_verification_agent_factory
component.description: Privacy Verification Agent Factory - generates specialized privacy verification agents using all 8 core agent factories (core, RAG, citation, web_search, consistency, medical, legal, financial) for regulatory-compliant privacy AI validation with PII detection, consent validation, data breach assessment, privacy impact analysis, cross-border data transfer compliance, privacy policy validation, data retention compliance, and anonymization verification
